definition: preceding all others in time, the first public performance of a play or movie, perform a work for the first time
details:
adjective
- preceding all others in time
= example: preceding all others in time
= synonyms: premier
noun
- the first public performance of a play or movie
verb
- perform a work for the first time
= synonyms: premier
- be performed for the first time
= example: be performed for the first time
= synonyms: premier
